divs: Sighting DetailsWas in my back yard assessing any damage from the storm and to let my dog run around. I just happended to look up and saw an object above the swift moving clouds, almost at the same height at 1st I thought it was a very large bird, then noticed it was hovering, watched it for a good 6-8 minutes give or take, clouds were moving at high rate of speed and I know it sounds ridiculous however it seemed like it was "hiding" and using the clouds to it's advantage. I had the feeling it knew I was watching it and it shot off at a tremedous speed. From the best description I could give it looked like a Brownish cigar shape object, wish I would have had my cell phone, but was afraid it would take off before I could locate....... Left me feeling very spooked and VERY uneasy.
Summary: Looked like a "Brown Cigar" Hovered for a good 8 minutes then seemed like "it " knew I was watching it, took off at a very high rate of speed.
trends: There have been 62 other sightings in Memphis
There were no other sightings in Memphis on or around September 1st 2012
